alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 4:07AM CST until December 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Winds gusting to 25 mph producing areas of blowing and drifting snow. Scattered snow showers will up to an inch or so of additional accumulation possible in the snowbelt. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions, especially in open areas where the visibility will be reduced at times.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
